title: race: map access converted to map reference
body:
by **Nightgunner5**: 
What steps will reproduce the problem?
If possible, include a link to a program on play.golang.org.
1. http://play.golang.org/p/gf0g4sy8dS
2. Compile with go build -race
3. Witness explosion

What is the expected output?
0

What do you see instead?
./prog.go:8: cannot take the address of runtime.mapaccess1(runtime.mapType =
&type.map[int][2]int, runtime.hmap = x, runtime.key = 0)[1]

Which compiler are you using (5g, 6g, 8g, gccgo)?
6g

Which operating system are you using?
Fedora 17 x86_64

Which version are you using?  (run 'go version')
go version devel +43afb4e714ad Fri Dec 14 06:20:24 2012 +1100 linux/amd64
